member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Bridge.AlarisDataBridge
member.summary: Bridges Alaris data providers to Lean engine's data infrastructure. Component ID: DTbr001A
member.remarks:
Responsibilities: - Aggregates data from multiple providers (Polygon, FMP, IBKR) - Runs data quality validation pipeline - Provides unified MarketDataSnapshot for strategy evaluation - Integrates with Lean's SubscriptionDataSource when needed
Usage in Lean algorithm: var bridge = new AlarisDataBridge(providers, validators, logger); var snapshot = await bridge.GetMarketDataSnapshotAsync("AAPL");

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Bridge.AlarisDataBridge.#ctor(Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr003A,Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr004A,Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr005A,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{Alaris.Data.Quality.DTqc002A},Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Bridge.AlarisDataBridge})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Bridge.AlarisDataBridge.SetSessionDataPath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the session data path for loading cached data (options, historical bars, etc.). Call this before using the bridge in backtest mode.
member.param: Path to the session's data folder.

member.summary: Gets complete market data snapshot for strategy evaluation.
member.param: The date for data evaluation (use LEAN's simulation time for backtests).

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Bridge.AlarisDataBridge.GetOptionChainWithCacheFallbackAsync(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets option chain with cache fallback for backtest mode. Loads from session cache if available, otherwise falls back to live API.
Gets option chain with cache fallback for backtest mode. Loads from session cache if verified strictly against evaluation date, otherwise fetches from provider.

member.summary: Gets historical bars for Yang-Zhang RV calculation (minimum 30 days).

member.summary: Gets earnings data (next event + historical for Leung-Santoli).
member.param: The symbol to fetch earnings for.
The evaluation date (simulation time for backtests).

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A
member.summary: Corporate Action Data Model. Component ID: DTmd003A

remarks.para: Represents a single corporate action event that may require price adjustments in historical backtesting data.

list.item: ExDate: The ex-dividend/split date (price adjusts on this date)
Factor: The adjustment multiplier (e.g., 2.0 for 2:1 split)
PayDate: When the action is paid/effective

member.param: Ticker symbol affected by this action.
Ex-date when the adjustment takes effect.
Adjustment factor. For splits: new shares per old share. For dividends: cash amount per share.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,Alaris.Data.Model.CorporateActionType,System.Decimal,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Corporate Action Data Model. Component ID: DTmd003A

remarks.para: Represents a single corporate action event that may require price adjustments in historical backtesting data.

list.item: ExDate: The ex-dividend/split date (price adjusts on this date)
Factor: The adjustment multiplier (e.g., 2.0 for 2:1 split)
PayDate: When the action is paid/effective

member.param: Ticker symbol affected by this action.
Ex-date when the adjustment takes effect.
Adjustment factor. For splits: new shares per old share. For dividends: cash amount per share.

member.summary: Ex-date when the adjustment takes effect.

member.summary: Type of corporate action.

member.summary: Adjustment factor. For splits: new shares per old share. For dividends: cash amount per share.

member.summary: Human-readable description of the action.

member.summary: Optional record date.

member.name: P:Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A.RequiresPriceAdjustment
member.summary: Gets whether this action requires price adjustment.

member.name: P:Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A.RequiresStrikeAdjustment
member.summary: Gets whether this action requires strike adjustment for options.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A.GetPriceMultiplier
member.summary: Computes the price adjustment multiplier.
member.returns: The multiplier to apply to pre-action prices. For a 2:1 split, returns 0.5 (price is halved).

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A.GetStrikeMultiplier
member.summary: Computes the strike adjustment multiplier for options.
member.returns: The multiplier to apply to pre-action strikes. For a 2:1 split, returns 0.5 (strikes are halved).

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTca001A
member.summary: Corporate Actions Provider Interface. Component ID: DTca001A

remarks.para: Provides methods for retrieving and applying corporate actions for historical data adjustment in backtesting. This is critical for:

list.item: Correctly aligning option strikes with underlying prices
Computing accurate IV term structure across events

remarks.para: Key Principle: Adjustment is a computation, not stored data. Raw prices are ground truth; adjustments are applied on-demand.
Live Trading Note: In live trading, IBKR handles corporate actions automatically (adjusts positions, issues new symbols). This interface is primarily for backtesting use.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTca001A.GetActionsAsync(System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets corporate actions for a symbol within a date range.
member.returns: List of corporate actions ordered by ex-date.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTca001A.AdjustPrice(System.Decimal,System.DateTime,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A})
member.summary: Adjusts a raw price for all corporate actions up to a given date.
member.param: The date of the raw price.
member.returns: The adjusted price as of today's terms.
member.remarks: Applies cumulative adjustment factors for all actions with ex-date after priceDate and before today.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTca001A.AdjustStrike(System.Decimal,System.DateTime,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A})
member.summary: Adjusts an option strike price for corporate actions.
member.param: The date the option was created/traded.

remarks.para: When a stock splits, the OCC adjusts:
This method handles the strike adjustment. For proper backtesting, always use this when comparing historical option strikes to adjusted equity prices.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTca001A.IsAffectedByAction(System.DateTime,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{Alaris.Data.Model.DTmd003A},System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a date falls within a period affected by a corporate action.
member.returns: True if the date is near a corporate action.
member.remarks: Useful for flagging IV surface data that may be unreliable due to corporate action effects.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Provider.FMP.FinancialModelingPrepProvider
member.summary: Financial Modeling Prep earnings calendar provider. Component ID: DTea001A
member.remarks:
Implements DTpr004A (Earnings Calendar Provider interface) using FMP free tier (250 calls/day).
API Documentation: https://financialmodelingprep.com/developer/docs/#Earnings-Calendar Endpoint: /v3/earnings-calendar
Free tier provides: - Earnings dates (confirmed and estimated) - EPS estimates and actuals - Fiscal quarter information - Up to 250 API calls per day

member.summary: Gets all earnings events in a date range.

member.summary: Maps FMP API response to EarningsEvent model.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Provider.SEC.SecEdgarProvider
member.summary: SEC EDGAR 8-K filings earnings provider. Component ID: DTea001B

remarks.para: Implements DTpr004A (Earnings Calendar Provider interface) using SEC EDGAR API.
Uses 8-K Form Item 2.02 ("Results of Operations and Financial Condition") filings to detect earnings announcements. These filings are required within 4 business days of an earnings release.
SEC API Requirements: - User-Agent header with contact info (required) - Rate limit: 10 requests/second - No API key needed

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.SEC.SecEdgarProvider.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Provider.SEC.SecEdgarProvider})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: HTTP client configured with SEC User-Agent.
member.exception: Thrown when httpClient or logger is null.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Provider.InteractiveBrokersSnapshotProvider
member.summary: Interactive Brokers implementation of execution quote provider. Component: DTib005A | Category: Data Provider | Variant: A (Primary)

remarks.para:
This provider supports two modes of operation:
Live/Paper Mode: Connects to IB Gateway for real-time quotes
Backtest Mode: Uses simulated quotes based on market data

Configuration is read from appsettings.jsonc InteractiveBrokers section:
"InteractiveBrokers": { "Host": "127.0.0.1", "Port": 4002, // 4002=paper, 4001=live "ClientId": 1, "TradingMode": "paper" }

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.InteractiveBrokersSnapshotProvider.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Provider.InteractiveBrokersSnapshotProvider})

member.summary: Generates a simulated quote for backtesting. Uses realistic bid-ask spreads based on option characteristics.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Provider.Polygon.PolygonApiClient
member.summary: Polygon.io REST API client for market data retrieval. Component ID: DTpr001A

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.Polygon.PolygonApiClient.GetHistoricalOptionChainAsync(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets historical option chain for backtesting. NOTE: Polygon does NOT provide historical Greeks/IV via API. This method calculates IV from historical option prices using Black-Scholes, which is the industry-standard approach for backtesting.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.Polygon.PolygonApiClient.CalculateImpliedVolatility(System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Calculates implied volatility using Newton-Raphson method on Black-Scholes model. This is necessary because Polygon does NOT provide historical IV via API.

remarks.para: Component ID: DTpr004A
Implementations provide upcoming and historical earnings events, including announcement dates, EPS estimates, and fiscal period data.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr004A.GetUpcomingEarningsAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets upcoming earnings events for a symbol.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr004A.GetHistoricalEarningsAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets historical earnings events for a symbol.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr004A.GetSymbolsWithEarningsAsync(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets all symbols with earnings in date range.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr005A
member.summary: Interface for risk-free rate providers.

remarks.para: Component ID: DTpr005A
Implementations provide current and historical risk-free rates (e.g., 3-month Treasury bill rates) for option pricing models.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr005A.GetCurrentRateAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the current risk-free rate (e.g., 3-month T-bill).

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.DTpr005A.GetHistoricalRatesAsync(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets historical risk-free rates.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Provider.PolygonUniverseProvider
member.summary: Polygon Universe Provider - fetches daily aggregates for all US stocks. Component ID: DTpr006A
member.remarks: Uses Polygon's Grouped Daily API to efficiently retrieve OHLCV data for all US equities on a given date. This enables universe selection without requiring QuantConnect's fundamental data subscription.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.PolygonUniverseProvider.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Provider.PolygonUniverseProvider})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Polygon Universe Provider.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.PolygonUniverseProvider.GetUniverseAsync(System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets all US stocks for a given date with their OHLCV data.
member.param: The date to fetch data for.
member.returns: List of stock aggregates for the date.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.PolygonUniverseProvider.GetFilteredUniverseAsync(System.DateTime,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets filtered US stocks meeting volume and price criteria.
member.param: The date to fetch data for.
member.returns: List of stocks meeting the filter criteria.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.PolygonUniverseProvider.GetUniverseTickersAsync(System.DateTime,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the list of tickers meeting universe criteria.
member.param: The date to fetch data for.
Maximum number of tickers to return.
member.returns: List of ticker symbols meeting criteria.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Provider.Treasury.TreasuryDirectRateProvider
member.summary: Treasury Direct API risk-free rate provider. Component ID: DTrf001A
member.remarks:
Provides risk-free rates using official US Treasury data. Implements DTpr005A (Risk-Free Rate Provider interface).
API: https://www.treasurydirect.gov/TA_WS/securities Cost: FREE (official US government API) Data: Daily treasury yields (3-month T-bill recommended for options) No authentication required
Usage: - 3-month T-bill rate used as risk-free rate (r parameter) - Updated daily - No rate limits on official API

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.Treasury.TreasuryDirectRateProvider.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Provider.Treasury.TreasuryDirectRateProvider})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Provider.Treasury.TreasuryDirectRateProvider.ParseRate(System.String)
member.summary: Parses interest rate string to decimal. Treasury rates are typically given as percentages (e.g., "5.25" for 5.25%).

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Quality.PriceReasonablenessValidator
member.summary: Validates price reasonableness and data freshness. Component ID: DTqc001A
member.remarks: Validation checks: - Spot price within 10% of previous close - Option bid > 0 and bid < ask - Option ask < intrinsic value + $10 - No stale timestamps (>1 hour old)

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Quality.PriceReasonablenessValidator.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Quality.PriceReasonablenessValidator})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Quality.IvArbitrageValidator
member.summary: Validates IV arbitrage conditions (put-call parity, calendar spreads). Component ID: DTqc002A
member.remarks: Validation checks: - Put-call parity holds within 2% - Calendar spread IV differences reasonable - No butterfly arbitrage opportunities >$0.50

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Quality.IvArbitrageValidator.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Quality.IvArbitrageValidator})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Quality.VolumeOpenInterestValidator
member.summary: Validates volume and open interest for liquidity requirements. Component ID: DTqc003A
member.remarks: Validation checks: - Volume > 0 for liquid options (OI > 100) - Volume within 10 of 30-day average - OI change consistent with volume

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Quality.VolumeOpenInterestValidator.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Quality.VolumeOpenInterestValidator})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Quality.EarningsDateValidator
member.summary: Validates earnings date accuracy and consistency. Component ID: DTqc004A
member.remarks: Validation checks: - Earnings date confirmed from 2+ sources (if possible) - Date within next 90 days - No conflicting dates in recent history

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Quality.EarningsDateValidator.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Data.Quality.EarningsDateValidator})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Alaris.Data.Quality.DTqc002A
member.summary: Interface for data quality validators.

remarks.para: Component ID: DTqc002A
Implementations validate market data snapshots against quality rules such as price reasonableness, IV arbitrage detection, volume/OI checks, and earnings date verification.

member.name: P:Alaris.Data.Quality.DTqc002A.ComponentId
member.summary: Gets the validator component ID (e.g., "DTqc001A").

member.name: M:Alaris.Data.Quality.DTqc002A.Validate(Alaris.Data.Model.MarketDataSnapshot)
member.summary: Validates market data snapshot.
